p.text: Development Environment program of Algorithm 2 is a window divided into several parts. Each part is responsible for a certain stage of development program (the creation of graphical user interface, configuration objects, programming).

textAll.p: program you can easily create a start and check how it works at any time. To do this, click the menu item Draft -> Run the program . When you run the project, the program can be debugged: pause, set breakpoints, etc. More information about this topic Debugging project

When the program is complete, you can create a separate *. exe-file of your program to be run without the aid algorithm. To do this, select File -> Create a ready-made program . Created file will be your own program and you can do with it what you want: throw off your friends, sell, distribute freely on the Internet.

remarks.text: development environment can be customized. More on this in environment settings
